title: Sine and Cosine - coordinates at intersection

content.question:
​

Moving clockwise from left, the circle passes through the following points:

(negative 2 comma 0)

(0 comma 2)

(2 comma 0)

(0 comma negative 2)

Three points labeled C, B, and A are marked on the circumference of the circle.

Point C lies at the circumference of the circle at (2 comma 0).

Point B lies at the circumference of the circle at approximately (1.5 comma negative 1.5).

Point A lies at the circumference of the circle at (0 comma negative 2).

A ray appears in quadrant 4, starting at (0 comma 0) and passing through point B.

​The figure shows a circle of radius <math alttext="2"><semantics><mn>2</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> along with four labeled points in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. The measure of angle <math alttext="C O B"><semantics><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is equal to the measure of angle <math alttext="A O B"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What are the coordinates of point <math alttext="B"><semantics><mi>B</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses cos open parentheses fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses comma sin open parentheses fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 2 sin open parentheses fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses comma 2 cos open parentheses fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
